data:item.name: pca9420uk-evm pmic for low power application
data:item.display_title: PMIC for Low Power Applications on FRDM-MCXN947 and MCXA153
data:item.overview: The PCA9420 is a highly integrated Power Management IC (PMIC), targeted to provide a full power management solution for low-power microcontroller applications or other similar applications. The device consists of a linear battery charger capable of charging up to 315 mA current. It has an IÂ²C programmable Constant Current (CC) and Constant Voltage (CV) values for flexible configuration.
